title: #175: The Secret Sauce | Bobby Sausalito
description:
Instagram star, Bobby Sausalito, might be best known online as Bobby Sauce, but the guy with the logical observations about the world that we are now currently living in is far more than just a witty guy with funny t-shirts.

The power of positive thinking, being appreciative of what we currently have, and getting others to think for themselves is Bobby’s mission, and so far it appears to be working as tens of thousands of people check in with him daily to get a read on where we stand as Americans.

Can the power of laughter be the key to breaking this entire fake COVID narrative, and will the Jester be allowed to explain how the world actually works? Bobby certainly hopes so.
